intro.title: Express Yourself
intro.subtitle: Welcome to Young Minds @ Edura, an online world where children’s imagination takes center stage!
intro.description: We bring together young storytellers, poets, and budding writers — giving them the space, prompts, and recognition they deserve.

begin.title: How we make creativity come alive?
begin.desc: Children can write stories, poems, essays, or even adapt their favorite classics or movies in their own words.
points: Every month, we compile top entries into a beautifully edited book with its own ISBN.
Available as both an eBook and print-on-demand copy on Amazon.
Each child’s work is showcased on our website, giving them real recognition as young authors.

spark.title: Need a little spark to get started?
spark.desc: Our platform offers writing prompts and themes to spark creativity.
points: Mini PowerPoint lessons and writing guides to help kids build stories step by step.
Editing support to refine their work before publication.
Collection of sample stories and poems written by children for inspiration.

finish.title: Finish your story, claim your glory
finish.desc: Upload your masterpiece: submit your writing in any format: text, PDF, Word doc, or even pictures of the drawings.
points: Exhibit your talent on video: share storytelling, poetry recitals, or readings of your own work in any format: MP4, AVI, MOV (Max 50MB).

celebrate.title: What you achieve?
celebrate.desc: Top 10 entries get published: each month, the best works are selected for publishing in our quarterly eBook and given special mention on the website.
points: Be a YouTube Star: winning videos are featured on our official YouTube channel, giving children their own spotlight.
Participation matters: all participants get e-certificates and top two winners receive Amazon vouchers every month.
Get your work published in Young Minds @ Edura: Every 3 months, we release a curated anthology of selected works, complete with ISBN, available on Amazon and proudly showcased on our website.
